Name: Expressing support of ElectrifyNY and its work to improve the environmental and public health outcomes for communities that are most impacted by the negative effects of the transportation sector’s dependency on fossil fuel.
Title: Resolution expressing support of ElectrifyNY and its work to improve the environmental and public health outcomes for communities that are most impacted by the negative effects of the transportation sector’s dependency on fossil fuel
BodyName: Committee on Environmental Protection and Waterfronts

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
